name: KINDERCARE LEARNING COMPANIES
govEntities: Office of the Secretary of Defense
sampleDescriptions: Issue areas include early childhood education appropriations and tax policy
Issue areas include early childhood education appropriations and tax policy
Lobbied for The Child Care Investment Act (H.R. 4571) to expand DCAP, CDCTC, and the employer provided child care credit.
Lobbied for early child hood education funding in the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024. Responded to a notice of proposed rulemaking by the Dept. of Health and Human Services.
Lobbied for the Child Nutrition Enhancement Act in order to increase the reimbursement rates to the sponsors of the Child and Adult Food Program (CACFP). Advocated for the Child Nutrition Improvement
